trans-unit.source: Retrieves sounds associated with a set of Windows operating system sound-event types.
trans-unit.target: 擷取一組的 Windows 作業系統音效事件類型相關聯的音效。

trans-unit.source: The SystemSounds class provides methods for retrieving the sounds associated with a set of operating system sound-event types for the current user.
trans-unit.target: SystemSounds 類別提供方法，用於擷取與目前使用者的作業系統音效事件類型的一組相關的聲音。

trans-unit.source: The sounds associated with each type of operating system sound event can be configured in Windows Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 控制台中，您可以設定每一種作業系統音效事件相關聯的音效。

trans-unit.source: SystemSounds provides static methods to access the sounds associated with the <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Asterisk%2A>, <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Beep%2A>, <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Exclamation%2A>, <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Hand%2A> and <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Question%2A> sound events.
trans-unit.target: SystemSounds 提供靜態方法，以存取相關聯的音效<xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Asterisk%2A>， <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Beep%2A>， <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Exclamation%2A>，<xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Hand%2A>和<xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Question%2A>音效的事件。</xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Question%2A> </xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Hand%2A> </xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Exclamation%2A> </xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Beep%2A> </xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Asterisk%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each property returns a <xref:System.Media.SystemSound> that can be used to play the sound.
trans-unit.target: 每個屬性會傳回<xref:System.Media.SystemSound>，可以用來播放聲音。</xref:System.Media.SystemSound>

trans-unit.source: Gets the sound associated with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Asterisk" name="Asterisk" href=""></xref> program event in the current Windows sound scheme.
trans-unit.target: 取得相關聯的音效<xref uid="langword_csharp_Asterisk" name="Asterisk" href=""></xref>程式目前的 Windows 音效配置中的事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Media.SystemSound"></xref> associated with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Asterisk" name="Asterisk" href=""></xref> program event in the current Windows sound scheme.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Media.SystemSound"> </xref>聯<xref uid="langword_csharp_Asterisk" name="Asterisk" href=""></xref>程式目前的 Windows 音效配置中的事件。
